company.description:
TRC Talent Solutions is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE). All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.

At TRC, we take pride in fulfilling our opportunity to add value to our clients business as their staffing partner, while working tirelessly to connect thousands of individuals each year with work opportunities where they can meet the needs of their families and have the potential to build their careers.

jobDescription.text:
GARBAGE JOB DESCRIPTION for Testing
 
Job Title: Forklift Operator 
Job Type: Full-time
Job Summary:
Are you an experienced and skilled Forklift Operator seeking a rewarding opportunity? Look no further! We are actively seeking a talented Forklift Operator to join our team and contribute to our thriving warehouse or industrial facility. As a Forklift Operator, your primary responsibility will be operating forklifts and other similar machinery safely and efficiently. From moving and stacking materials to loading and unloading products, precision and timeliness will be key. If you have excellent coordination skills, attention to detail, and a strong commitment to workplace safety, we encourage you to apply for this exciting position!
What We Offer:
Joining our team as a Forklift Operator comes with a range of benefits and perks:
•    Competitive market wages: We believe in fair compensation that recognizes your expertise and dedication.
•    Clean and safe work environments: Our commitment to cleanliness and safety ensures a pleasant and secure workplace for our employees.
•    Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance: Your well-being is important to us, and we provide comprehensive coverage to support your health needs.
•    Earned paid time off: We understand the value of work-life balance and offer paid time off so you can recharge and enjoy your personal time.
Responsibilities:
As a valued Forklift Operator, your duties will include:
•    Safely operating forklifts, pallet jacks, and hand trucks to efficiently move, stack, load, and unload materials, products, or equipment.
•    Transporting goods to designated storage areas or loading docks, adhering to established procedures and safety guidelines.
•    Verifying and meticulously documenting incoming and outgoing materials to ensure accuracy and completeness.
•    Regularly inspecting and maintaining equipment, promptly reporting any mechanical issues or malfunctions to supervisors.
•    Strictly adhering to safety regulations and operating procedures to prevent accidents, injuries, or damage to equipment or property.
•    Maintaining a clean and organized work environment, including proper storage and labeling of materials and supplies.
•    Collaborating effectively with warehouse staff, truck drivers, and other team members to ensure smooth and efficient operations.
•    Assisting in inventory management by conducting cycle counts and providing accurate information on stock levels.
•    Following company policies and procedures, particularly those related to quality control and compliance.
Requirements:
To succeed in this role, candidates should meet the following requirements:
•    High school diploma or equivalent.
•    Verifiable previous forklift operator certification/license.
•    Proven experience as a forklift operator or in a similar role.
•    Strong knowledge of forklift operations and safety procedures.
•    Ability to operate forklifts and other heavy machinery with precision and efficiency.
•    Excellent hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness.
•    Attention to detail and accuracy in recording information and handling materials.
•    Physical stamina and strength to perform tasks involving heavy lifting, prolonged standing, bending, and reaching.
•    Excellent communication skills and the ability to thrive in a team environment.
•    Familiarity with warehouse operations and inventory management is preferred.
•    Flexibility to work extended shifts and occasional weekends, as needed.
Targeted Skills:
In addition to being a skilled forklift operator, proficiency in the following areas is advantageous:
•    Stand-up lift, reach truck, cherry picker operation.
•    RF scanners for order picking and put away.
•    Receiving and pallet building expertise.
•    Industrial truck operation.
If you are an experienced Forklift Operator looking for a challenging and rewarding career opportunity, we want to hear from you! To apply, please submit your resume, along with any relevant certifications or licenses, to: Resume@trcstaffing.com. 
Take the first step towards joining our dynamic team!
